renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 color, in vec2 coord )
{
    float n1 = 1.0,
          n2 = 1.5,
          lambda1 = 0.9,
          lambda2 = 0.11,
          t = iTime,
          thetai1 = 0.7 * cos(0.15 * t),
          thetat1 = asin(n1 / n2 * sin(thetai1)),
          thetai2 = 0.7 * sin(0.15 * t),
          thetat2 = asin(n2 / n1 * sin(thetai2)),
          cr1 = (n1 - n2) / (n1 + n2),
          ct1 = 2.0 * n1 / (n1 + n2),
          cr2 = (n2 - n1) / (n1 + n2),
          ct2 = 2.0 * n2 / (n1 + n2);
    
    vec2 res = iResolution.xy,
         r = (2.0 * coord - res) / res.y,
         ki1 = n1 / lambda1 * vec2(cos(thetai1), sin(thetai1)),
         kr1 = n1 / lambda1 * vec2(-cos(thetai1), sin(thetai1)),
         kt1 = n2 / lambda1 * vec2(cos(thetat1), sin(thetat1)),
         ki2 = n2 / lambda2 * vec2(-cos(thetai2), sin(thetai2)),
         kr2 = n2 / lambda2 * vec2(cos(thetai2), sin(thetai2)),
         kt2 = n1 / lambda2 * vec2(-cos(thetat2), sin(thetat2));

    float ai1 = cos(dot(ki1, r) - t * 2.0),
          ar1 = cos(dot(kr1, r) - t * 2.0) * cr1,
          at1 = cos(dot(kt1, r) - t * 2.0) * ct1,
          ai2 = cos(dot(ki2, r) - t * 2.0),
          ar2 = cos(dot(kr2, r) - t * 2.0) * cr2,
          at2 = cos(dot(kt2, r) - t * 2.0) * ct2,
          a = 0.5 * mix(ai1 + ar1 + at2, at1 + ai2 + ar2, step(0.0, r.x));
    
    vec3 col = 0.5 + 0.5 * cos(t + r.xyx + vec3(0, 2, 4));
    
    color.xyz = a * a * col;
}
renderpass.name: Image
